shot.name: Ultra Close-up
shot.value: Ultra close-up editorial (9:16), focusing on intricate details.

shot.name: Intimate Close-up
shot.value: Intimate close-up shot, focusing on a specific feature like the lips, eyes, or hands, creating a sense of closeness and personal connection.

shot.name: Sensual Detail Shot
shot.value: A macro or detail shot focusing on the texture of fabric against skin, the curve of the neck, or the line of the collarbone, emphasizing sensuality through detail.

shot.name: Artistic Body-scape
shot.value: An abstract, artistic shot that frames the body as a landscape, using light and shadow to create shapes and lines rather than a traditional portrait.

shot.name: Close-up Portrait
shot.value: Close-up portrait shot, from the shoulders up, capturing emotion.

shot.name: Medium Shot
shot.value: Medium shot from the waist up, showing the subject and their immediate environment.

shot.name: Cowboy Shot
shot.value: Cowboy shot, framed from mid-thigh up, ideal for showing action or confidence.

shot.name: Full Body Shot
shot.value: Full body shot, capturing the entire subject from head to toe, showcasing wardrobe and pose.

pose.name: Architectural Power Stance
pose.value: Standing with a powerful, almost architectural posture, one arm raised, creating strong lines that emphasize the structure of the garment. Torso is slightly twisted, revealing the midriff. Wide, stable stance.

pose.name: Relaxed Supine (Overhead)
pose.value: Lying on back on a simple white sheet on the floor, arms resting loosely at sides. The pose is vulnerable and completely relaxed, turning the body into a flat canvas for light and shadow.

pose.name: Dynamic Motion
pose.value: Captured mid-motion, as if gracefully pivoting or stepping. Her torso is in a subtle, elegant twist. The pose feels candid, yet perfectly composed.

pose.name: Confident Stand
pose.value: Standing confidently, facing the camera with a strong posture, one hand on hip, looking directly into the lens.

pose.name: Relaxed Sitting
pose.value: Sitting on a vintage chair, leaning slightly forward with crossed legs, exuding a relaxed and engaging expression.

pose.name: Elegant Recline
pose.value: Reclining gracefully on a velvet chaise lounge, creating long, elegant lines with the body, head tilted back slightly.

pose.name: Leaning on Wall
pose.value: Casually leaning against a textured wall, one leg bent, creating a relaxed but composed triangular shape with the body.

pose.name: Kneeling Glance
pose.value: Kneeling on the floor on one or both knees, body angled slightly away, glancing softly over the shoulder at the camera.

pose.name: Kneeling Over-the-Shoulder
pose.value: Kneeling on the floor facing away from the camera, head and torso twisted to look back over the shoulder, creating a dynamic and alluring line.

pose.name: Relaxed & Vulnerable
pose.value: Lying on a soft surface like a bed or rug, looking at the camera with a soft, relaxed expression, conveying a sense of trust and vulnerability.

pose.name: Confident & Bold Stare
pose.value: Seated, leaning forward with elbows on knees, looking directly and intensely into the camera with a powerful and confident expression.

pose.name: Thoughtful & Enchanting Glance
pose.value: Subject is turned slightly away from the camera, looking off-frame with a thoughtful or distant expression, lit by soft window light.

pose.name: Candid Walking
pose.value: Captured mid-stride while walking towards the camera on a city street, with natural movement and a slight, confident smile.

pose.name: Candid Laughter
pose.value: A genuine moment of laughter, head tilted back slightly, eyes sparkling with joy. A natural, unposed expression.

pose.name: Leaning Forward Intently
pose.value: Leaning forward over a table or surface, hands clasped, with an intense and focused gaze towards the camera, creating a feeling of intimacy and engagement.

pose.name: Mid-Twirl
pose.value: Captured in the middle of a graceful twirl, with fabric flowing and a sense of dynamic, joyful motion.

pose.name: Reaching Towards Camera
pose.value: One hand gently reaching towards the camera lens, creating a sense of connection and breaking the fourth wall.

pose.name: Arching Back on Bed
pose.value: Lying on a bed, back gently arched to create a graceful curve, head turned towards the camera with a soft expression.

pose.name: Seated Highlighting Curves
pose.value: Seated on the edge of a chair or floor, one leg drawn up, torso twisted to emphasize the natural curves of the waist and hips.

pose.name: Prone Glance Back
pose.value: Lying on stomach, propped up on elbows, looking back over the shoulder at the camera. A pose that is both relaxed and engaging.

pose.name: Draped Over Furniture
pose.value: Casually and elegantly draped over a piece of furniture like a sofa arm or chaise lounge, creating long, flowing lines.

pose.name: Hands Tracing Form
pose.value: Pose where one or both hands are gently tracing the lines of the body, such as the waist, hip, or collarbone, suggesting intimacy and self-awareness.

pose.name: Dynamic Floor S-Curve
pose.value: Sitting on the floor in a dynamic S-curve, one leg extended, torso twisted with one arm braced behind, creating a fluid, sculptural line.

pose.name: Commanding Seated Lean
pose.value: Seated on a low stool, leaning to one side with a powerful, commanding expression, looking down towards the camera.

pose.name: Power Arch (Seated)
pose.value: Seated on a low stool, leaning back on her hands, arching her back with chin tilted up, exuding dominance and power.

pose.name: Contemplative Seated Curl
pose.value: Seated on the floor, curled slightly with knees drawn up and arms wrapped around them, head bowed in a thoughtful, classical pose.

pose.name: Confident Recline on Bed
pose.value: Reclining on a messy bed with an arm resting behind her head, one leg bent, exuding a bold and natural confidence.

lighting.name: Cinematic Volumetric Lighting
lighting.value: Cinematic volumetric lighting, with strong beams of light cutting through atmospheric haze, creating a sense of depth and mystery.

lighting.name: Soft Diffused Studio Light
lighting.value: Soft, diffused studio lighting that eliminates harsh shadows and provides an even, flattering illumination, perfect for beauty shots.

lighting.name: Dramatic Rim Lighting
lighting.value: Dramatic rim lighting that outlines the subject against a dark background, emphasizing their silhouette and creating a bold, graphic effect.

lighting.name: Bioluminescent Glow
lighting.value: Bioluminescent lighting, with soft, natural glows emanating from fantastical flora or otherworldly sources, creating an enchanting and magical ambiance.

lighting.name: Dynamic Strobe Flash
lighting.value: Strobe lighting with sharp, fast flashes, creating a sense of dynamic motion and high energy, with distinct frozen moments.

lighting.name: Dappled Light (Venetian Blinds)
lighting.value: Sunlight or moonlight filtering through Venetian blinds, casting a dramatic pattern of sharp light and shadow stripes across the subject and the room.

lighting.name: Soft Clamshell Lighting
lighting.value: Classic beauty lighting setup with two soft light sources on the subject from above and below, creating a clean, glamorous look with minimal shadows.

lighting.name: Hard High-Angle Studio
lighting.value: Hard, directional warm studio lighting from a high side angle, creating dramatic, sharp shadows and brilliant highlights that intricately sculpt textures.

lighting.name: Filtered Light Moiré Pattern
lighting.value: Sunlight filtered through two layers of patterned lace or mesh curtains, creating a complex, soft-edged moiré or cross-hatch shadow pattern.

lighting.name: Soft Side-Wrap Light (Octabox)
lighting.value: A single, large, soft light source (like a large octabox softbox) placed to the side and slightly behind, creating a soft, wrapping light that highlights contours.

lighting.name: Painterly Chiaroscuro (Caravaggio)
lighting.value: Dramatic, single-source Chiaroscuro lighting from the side and slightly above, illuminating part of the form while the rest of a falls into deep shadow, in the style of Caravaggio.

lighting.name: Moody Bedside Lamp
lighting.value: Moody cinematic lighting from a single bedside lamp, creating deep shadows and a glamorous, intimate feel.

style.name: Authentic (Visible Pores)
style.value: Authentic, high-resolution skin texture with visible pores, subtle freckles, and natural imperfections. A hint of subsurface scattering on the cheekbones where the light hits. No airbrushing.

style.name: Subtle Subsurface Scattering
style.value: Realistic skin texture with pronounced subsurface scattering, creating a soft, life-like glow as light penetrates and diffuses just below the surface, especially evident around the nose and ears.

style.name: Flawless Editorial Skin
style.value: Perfectly smooth, high-fashion editorial skin. While pores are minimized, a micro-texture is retained to avoid a plastic look. Highlights show a gentle falloff.

style.name: Cinematic Skin
style.value: Realistic skin with a cinematic feel, showing natural texture and subtle details that catch the light beautifully. Retains a filmic quality with a visible, fine grain texture.

style.name: Flowing Silk Dynamics
style.value: The silk fabric is captured with dynamic, flowing motion. It appears lightweight, with realistic transparency where stretched and bunched, and follows the contours of the body with liquid grace.

style.name: Clinging Wet Look
style.value: Fabric (like cotton or chiffon) clings to the skin as if damp, revealing the form beneath in a subtle, artistic way. Small droplets might be visible on the fabric surface.

style.name: Liquid Satin Sheen
style.value: Liquid satin with a high specular sheen, creating brilliant, sharp highlights where the light hits directly, and falling into deep, rich shadows. The color shifts with the light angle.

style.name: Intricate Lace & Mesh
style.value: The material is a combination of intricate floral lace patterns and fine, sheer mesh. Light passes through the mesh, creating a delicate pattern on the skin, while the lace remains opaque.

style.name: High-Gloss Latex
style.value: High-gloss black latex that acts like a mirror, reflecting the light source and environment with sharp, distorted highlights. The material appears slick and futuristic.

style.name: Experimental Fine-Art Boudoir

quality.name: Hasselblad X2D
quality.value: Shot on a Hasselblad X2D. Unmatched 8K detail. Extremely sharp focus. Every micro-detail, from fabric weave to skin pores, is rendered with absolute clarity.

quality.name: Kodak Portra 400 Look
quality.value: Shot on Kodak Portra 400 film. 8k, natural textures, beautiful color rendition, and a subtle, pleasing film grain. High-end cinematic quality.

quality.name: IMAX 70mm Cinematic
quality.value: Cinematic still, shot on IMAX 70mm film. Incredible detail, epic scope, and rich, deep colors. Visible film grain.

quality.name: Leica Noctilux Look
quality.value: Shot on a Leica M11 with a Noctilux 50mm f/0.95 lens. Extremely shallow depth of field, beautiful bokeh, and a dreamy, ethereal quality.

quality.name: RAW Cinematic (Helmut Newton)
quality.value: A glamorous, bold, and realistic feel, inspired by the cinematic and provocative style of Helmut Newton. 8k, natural textures, no artificial plastic look, high-end cinematic quality.

figureAndForm.name: Revealing Curves (Shadow Play)
figureAndForm.value: Focus on revealing the natural curves and shapes of the body (e.g., lower back, upper bust) using strategic shadow and light, obscuring precise details for an artistic, evocative effect.

figureAndForm.name: Back & Hip Curves (Kneeling)
figureAndForm.value: Emphasizes the elegant S-curve of the spine and hips from a three-quarter back angle while kneeling, focusing on the fine lines of form.

figureAndForm.name: Side Profile (Reclining)
figureAndForm.value: Artistically frames the lines of the hip, thigh, and waist as a landscape of curves, with the subject reclining.

figureAndForm.name: Torso Detail (Obscured)

vera.name: Midnight Lace Bodysuit
vera.description: An intricate bodysuit crafted from fine French Chantilly lace, featuring a daringly low neckline, high-cut legs, and a completely open back. The delicate floral patterns are strategically placed to both conceal and reveal.

vera.name: Crimson Silk Teddy
vera.description: A bias-cut teddy made from liquid-like crimson silk charmeuse. It drapes loosely over the torso and features delicate spaghetti straps and eyelash lace trim along the bust and hem.

vera.name: Geometric Cutout Bodysuit
vera.description: A high-fashion bodysuit made from a matte, scuba-like material. It features sharp, asymmetrical cutouts that create a play of negative space, highlighting the form beneath in a graphic, architectural manner.

vera.name: Single-Thread Body Harness
vera.description: The most minimal of garments. A single, continuous thread of elasticated silk or fine leather that wraps around the body to create geometric patterns, emphasizing contours without concealing them.

vera.name: Strappy Geometric Harness
vera.description: A complex harness of interconnected faux leather straps that frame the torso, waist, and hips. It features polished metal O-rings and buckles, creating a look that is both restrictive and empowering.

vera.name: Sheer Silk Chiffon Robe
vera.description: A floor-length, completely sheer robe made from the lightest silk chiffon. It has voluminous bishop sleeves and floats around the body, creating a hazy, dreamlike silhouette.

vera.name: Slashed-Jersey Monokini
vera.description: A one-piece garment that looks like a swimsuit but is made from soft jersey. It features strategic "slashes" and cutouts held together by small metal rings, revealing slices of skin in an unexpected, artistic pattern.

vera.name: Liquid Latex Catsuit
vera.description: A second-skin catsuit made from high-shine black latex. While it covers the entire body, its form-fitting nature and reflective surface highlight every curve and contour.

vera.name: Golden Body Chains
vera.description: Ultra-luxury golden body chains creating geometric patterns across décolletage, waist, and hips. Strategic minimal coverage emphasizing natural form with artistic precision.

vera.name: Architectural Leather Harness
vera.description: Intricate black leather harness with geometric straps creating graphic patterns. Strategic bands frame torso, waist, and hips with architectural precision.

vera.name: Delicate Mesh Thong Set
vera.description: High-waisted black mesh thong with geometric details and matching sheer thigh-high stockings. Minimal fine art aesthetic sculpted by light.

vera.name: Vintage Seamed Stockings
vera.description: Sheer black silk stockings with classic back seams and delicate lace tops. Pairs with corsetry for film noir glamour.

vera.name: Intimate Lace Bralette
vera.description: Delicate black lace bralette with intricate floral patterns and matching high-waisted lace-trimmed briefs. Natural beauty emphasis.

vera.name: Ornate Lace Corset
vera.description: Black lace corset with intricate embroidery, structured boning, and dramatic waist cinching. Creates classic hourglass silhouette.

vera.name: Sheer Black Chiffon Robe
vera.description: Floor-length completely sheer black chiffon robe with flowing movement. Creates hazy, mysterious silhouette worn open.

vera.name: Minimal Body Chain Design
vera.description: Single continuous chain creating geometric patterns emphasizing chest, waist, and curves with artistic minimalism.

vera.name: Seductress Level 1: Professional Elegance
vera.description: Structured architectural foundation garments with executive sophistication. Matte black with seamless construction, high-waisted foundation creating flawless executive silhouette.

vera.name: Seductress Level 2: Sophisticated Allure
vera.description: Haute couture intimates with designer details. Black silk and delicate Chantilly lace with intricate patterns, architectural seams, fine appliqués, and pearl-tipped closures.

vera.name: Seductress Level 3: Editorial Sensuality
vera.description: Graphic editorial pieces with sheer mesh and architectural lines. Black gossamer lace V-neck bodysuit with geometric cutouts and mesh panels playing with opacity.

vera.name: Seductress Level 4: Intimate Artistry
vera.description: High-fashion artistic bodysuits with transparent elements. Geometric strap bodysuit in matte black featuring interconnected architectural straps creating cage-like framework.

vera.name: Seductress Level 5: High Concept Seduction
vera.description: Minimalist architectural pieces with maximum expression. Open framework bodice with architectural underwire composed of open space, creating graphic outlines with strategic straps.

vera.name: Seductress Level 6: Maximum Expression
vera.description: Ultra-minimal foundation and body adornments for fine art. Delicate metallic body chains draping over shoulders, torso, and hips. Minimalist triangle with pearl-tipped closures.

vera.name: Seductress Level 7: Pure Artistry
vera.description: Conceptual art wardrobe using shadow, light, and silk draping. Strategically draped liquid silk or artistic use of deep shadows and light patterns creating clothing through pure light manipulation.

vera.name: Luxury Penthouse Suite
vera.description: A sprawling penthouse with floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking a sparkling city at night. Features modern, minimalist furniture, a marble fireplace, and a sense of opulent isolation.

vera.name: Rain-Soaked Neon Alley
vera.description: A narrow, gritty alley in a futuristic city, slick with rain. The scene is illuminated only by the vibrant, chaotic glow of neon signs reflecting off wet pavement.

vera.name: Modern Art Gallery After Hours
vera.description: A stark, minimalist art gallery, empty of visitors. Large, abstract canvases and dramatic sculptures create a backdrop of sophisticated creativity.

vera.name: Secluded Beach at Sunset
vera.description: An untouched stretch of black sand beach as the sun dips below the horizon, casting the sky in fiery colors. Volcanic rock formations create dramatic silhouettes.

vera.name: Industrial Loft with City Views
vera.description: A spacious, open-plan loft in a converted warehouse, featuring exposed brick walls, large factory windows, and a mix of vintage and modern furnishings.

vera.name: Vintage Orient Express Carriage
vera.description: An opulent, restored train carriage from the 1920s, featuring polished wood paneling, velvet upholstery, and Art Deco details, moving through a misty landscape.

vera.name: Professional Photography Studio
vera.description: Minimalist photography studio with seamless grey backdrop, polished concrete floor creating subtle reflections, vast negative space for fine art compositions.

vera.name: Industrial Minimalist Space
vera.description: Raw industrial space with textured concrete walls, dramatic shadows, and cold ambient light creating stark, powerful atmosphere.

vera.name: Luxury Private Boudoir
vera.description: Intimate luxury bedroom with ivory silk sheets, soft white walls, sheer curtains, and warm morning light creating private sanctuary.

vera.name: Art Deco Hotel Suite
vera.description: Opulent art deco hotel suite with rich burgundy velvet furniture, gold accents, dramatic shadows, and warm amber lighting from vintage fixtures.

vera.name: Luxury Infinity Pool
vera.description: Crystal clear infinity pool or shallow natural water with pristine white background, water creating refraction and ripples in bright natural light.

vera.name: Minimalist White Studio
vera.description: Minimalist white studio with seamless background and warm golden hour sunlight streaming through large diffused windows creating ethereal atmosphere.

vera.name: Cozy Wooden Cabin
vera.description: Minimalist wooden cabin with warm crackling fireplace, natural wood textures, and sheepskin rugs creating intimate rustic comfort.

vera.name: Underground VIP Club
vera.description: Exclusive underground club VIP room with velvet furniture, dramatic dark lighting, and soundproof privacy creating mysterious midnight atmosphere.

categorized.name: Modern Executive Office
categorized.value: A sleek, modern executive office at night, with glass walls, designer furniture (like an Eames chair), and the ambient glow from computer monitors and the city skyline.

categorized.name: Corner Office (Day)
categorized.value: A sun-drenched corner office with panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking a bustling city during the day. Minimalist, high-end decor.

categorized.name: Luxury Boardroom
categorized.value: A state-of-the-art boardroom with a long, polished mahogany table, leather chairs, and advanced teleconferencing equipment subtly in the background.

categorized.name: High-Tech Server Room
categorized.value: A cool, blue-lit server room with rows of humming server racks, creating a futuristic and industrial-corporate feel.

categorized.name: Architectural Firm Studio
categorized.value: A bright, open-plan architectural studio filled with models, blueprints, and drafting tables, under skylights.

categorized.name: Penthouse Apartment (Minimalist)
categorized.value: A minimalist penthouse apartment with stark white walls, polished concrete floors, and designer furniture, offering a stunning view of the city below.

categorized.name: Corporate Lobby
categorized.value: The expansive, marble-floored lobby of a modern skyscraper, with a large, abstract sculpture and a sense of scale and power.

categorized.name: Private Jet Interior
categorized.value: The luxurious interior of a private jet, with cream leather seats, polished wood trim, and soft, ambient lighting.

categorized.name: Rooftop Helipad
categorized.value: A concrete helipad on the roof of a skyscraper at twilight, with the city lights beginning to sparkle below.

categorized.name: Minimalist Art Gallery
categorized.value: A sterile, white-walled art gallery with high ceilings and polished concrete floors, featuring a single, large abstract painting.

categorized.name: Gritty Urban Loft
categorized.value: A raw, gritty urban loft with exposed brick walls, visible pipes, large industrial windows, and a raw, edgy, creative feel.

categorized.name: Empty Dance Studio
categorized.value: An empty dance studio with sprung wooden floors, a wall of mirrors, and soft, diffused light from large windows.

categorized.name: Baroque Palace Ballroom
categorized.value: An opulent, grand ballroom in a Baroque palace, with gilded moldings, crystal chandeliers, and polished marble floors reflecting the light.

categorized.name: Museum (Classical Antiquity)
categorized.value: A quiet hall in a museum, surrounded by ancient Greek and Roman marble statues, creating a timeless and classical atmosphere.

categorized.name: Abandoned Theatre
categorized.value: The dusty, atmospheric stage of an abandoned Art Deco theatre, with decaying velvet seats and a single ghost light.

categorized.name: Graffiti-Covered Alley
categorized.value: A vibrant, graffiti-covered alleyway in a bustling city, full of color, texture, and urban energy.

categorized.name: Modern Glasshouse/Conservatory
categorized.value: A large, modern conservatory with a steel and glass structure, filled with exotic, oversized tropical plants and orchids.

categorized.name: Minimalist Concrete Studio
categorized.value: A minimalist studio with a dark grey or black textured concrete wall. The floor is polished concrete that reflects subtle highlights.

categorized.name: Luxury Hotel (Night Cityscape)
categorized.value: A luxurious, modern hotel room with floor-to-ceiling windows revealing a dazzling cityscape at night. The room is immaculate with high-end furniture.

categorized.name: Messy Luxury Hotel Room
categorized.value: A dimly lit luxurious hotel room post-celebration, with a messy king-sized bed with silk sheets and clothes draped over a chair.

categorized.name: Intimate Bedroom (Morning Light)
categorized.value: An intimate bedroom setting with soft, unmade cotton sheets on a bed, with gentle morning light filtering through a sheer curtain.

categorized.name: Private Library (Fireplace)
categorized.value: A cozy, private library with dark wood paneling, a crackling fireplace, and comfortable leather armchairs.

categorized.name: Luxury Bathroom & Tub
categorized.value: A spacious, luxurious bathroom with marble surfaces, a large freestanding bathtub filled with water, and soft, ambient lighting.

categorized.name: Secluded Cabin in Woods
categorized.value: A rustic yet modern cabin deep in the woods, with a large window looking out onto a pine forest, and a warm, inviting interior.

categorized.name: Private Gallery Space
categorized.value: A private, intimate studio sanctuary designed for personal reflection, with soft textures and a single, comfortable chaise lounge.

categorized.name: Rainy Window Nook
categorized.value: A comfortable window seat in a high-rise apartment, with rain streaking down the glass and the city lights blurred in the background.

categorized.name: Velvet-Draped Boudoir
categorized.value: A classic boudoir setting with heavy velvet curtains, antique furniture, and a soft, sensual, and private atmosphere.

categorized.name: Sun-Drenched Tuscan Villa Patio
categorized.value: The rustic stone patio of a private Tuscan villa, bathed in the warm, golden light of late afternoon, overlooking rolling hills.

categorized.name: Infinite White Void
categorized.value: An infinite, seamless white void or cyclorama, where the subject is the only element, creating a sense of isolation and focus on form.

categorized.name: Infinite Black Void
categorized.value: An infinite, light-absorbing black void, where form is carved out of the darkness by carefully placed lighting.

categorized.name: Room of Mirrors
categorized.value: A room where the walls, floor, and ceiling are covered in mirrors, creating an endless, fragmented reflection of the subject.

categorized.name: Submerged in Water
categorized.value: The subject is floating gracefully in clear, still water, with fabric billowing around them and light refracting from the surface.

categorized.name: Abstract Geometric Set
categorized.value: A physical set made of large, monochromatic geometric shapes (cubes, spheres, pyramids) that the subject can interact with.

categorized.name: Field of Single-Color Flowers
categorized.value: An endless, surreal field of flowers, all of the exact same vibrant color (e.g., all scarlet poppies or all cobalt blue irises).

categorized.name: Cloudscape at Sunset
categorized.value: The subject appears to be sitting or standing on a solid bank of clouds during a vibrant, surreal sunset.

categorized.name: Neon-Lit Cyberpunk Alley
categorized.value: A narrow, rain-slicked alley in a futuristic cyberpunk city, illuminated by the vibrant, chaotic glow of neon signs and holographic advertisements.

categorized.name: Surrealist Desert Landscape
categorized.value: A dreamlike desert landscape inspired by Dali or Tanguy, with melting clocks, strange rock formations, and a dramatic, painted sky.

categorized.name: Projected Universe
categorized.value: The subject is in a dark room, and images of nebulae and galaxies are projected onto their form and the walls around them.
